TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Argument extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize

remarks.format: ## Remarks Functionally, this is just a reference to another <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty>. If you manually instantiate this class, call <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Argument.BeginInit%2A> before you set the first property of the object and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Argument.EndInit%2A> after you set the last property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Default constructor required for XAML deserialization.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void BeginInit() cil managed
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void EndInit() cil managed

Docs.summary: Indicates whether the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty"> pointed to by <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.Argument.Property%2A> must be defined so that the definition of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty"> that owns this argument makes sense.
Docs.value: Returns `true` if the BaseProperty must be defined; otherwise, `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This field is optional and is set to `false` by default.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty"> that this argument refers to.
Docs.value: Returns the name of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty"> that this argument refers to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks To set the name, the value must point to a valid <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty>. This field is mandatory and culture-invariant.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the string used to separate the argument value from the parent <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty"> switch in the command line.
Docs.value: Returns the string used to separate the argument value from the parent <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.XamlTypes.BaseProperty"> switch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This field is optional and culture-invariant.
